about.title: About Me
about.section1: I am a software developer and Systems Analysis & Development student at the University of Passo Fundo (UPF), based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. I have specialized in creating full-stack web applications with clean, dynamic user interfaces, along with back-end systems such as REST APIs and databases, optimizing my workflow through automation processes and custom tooling.
about.section2: I'm easily adaptable and committed to staying updated on the industry trends, while also maintaining a foundation in traditional and reliable technologies. Feel free to explore my work, and don't hesitate to reach out — I'm always seeking to connect, learn and collaborate!
